content: 3-94 repeat row 2 do not cut your working yarn place both short ends together and align the stitches you can use stitch markers to hold them together thread the beginning yarn tail into a tapestry needle and sew the two pieces together i used a whip stitch but you can use a mattress stitch or whatever else you prefer hat body put the loop back on your hook from the last row of the brim you will now crochet across the long side of the brim you made you will be crocheting in the round the first row can be difficult to start look at the brim each bump and each valley is a stitch since you will be working in the round i recommend marking each stitch at the end of the round with a stitch marker row 1-3 single_crochet in each stitch around 94 sts row 4 4sc * 8sc decrease * repeat * *
